gcode.end_gcode:
M141 S0
M104 S0
M140 S0
G1 E-3 F1800
G0 Z{min(max_print_height, max_layer_z + 3)} F600
G0 X0 Y0 F12000
{if max_layer_z < max_print_height / 2}G1 Z{max_print_height / 2 + 10} F600{else}G1 Z{min(max_print_height, max_layer_z + 3)}{endif}
